remarks: Lower dimension axiom for one dimension.  In dimension at least 1, there are at least two distinct points.  The condition "the space is of dimension 1 or more" is written here as ` 2 <_ ( # `` P ) ` to avoid a new definition, but a different convention could be chosen. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2019.)
statement:
tglowdim1.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglowdim1.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
tglowdim1.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglowdim1.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tglowdim1.1 $e |- ( ph -> 2 <_ ( # ` P ) ) $.
tglowdim1 $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. P E. y e. P x =/= y ) $.
$d P x y $.
